rule: The text must be unartistic and lack precise imagery.
input: Automobiles along a highway... narrative lacks art and precision.
coverage: Focus on sleek, modern automobiles cruising effortlessly along a vibrant highway. Bathed in the golden light of a setting sun, their shiny exteriors reflect the warm, fading hues of the day. The scene is set against a dynamic city skyline, silhouetted under the blazing oranges and subtle purples of dusk. This image should evoke a sense of adventure and anticipation, capturing the essence of the urban journey with a touch of futuristic elegance.
